docs(shared): improve Doxygen documentation for cldir_ex_ignore functions  Updated function documentation to use proper Doxygen format for: - cldir_ex_ignore() in file_op.h (public API) - cldir_ex_ignore_recursive() in file_op.c (internal implementation) - should_preserve_path() in file_op.c (helper function)
test(shared): add unit tests for cldir_ex_ignore subdirectory handling
test(unit): refactor dirent wrappers to properly mock closedir

fix(shared): preserve directory structure in UnmergeFiles ignore list  The function was only storing basenames, not relative paths. This caused cldir_ex_ignore to fail finding files in subdirectories. Now stores full relative paths like "subfolder/file.conf".

fix(shared): handle subdirectory paths in cldir_ex_ignore function  The function was not checking subdirectory paths in the ignore list, causing protected files to be incorrectly deleted. Refactored to use recursive logic that preserves directories containing protected files.
